column5: Guys 1 guy told me about rouge river end.He says it end somewhere by dam and there is hundreds of people fishing for rainbow there.People go early in night to take spot.He told me it is somewhere on Alton Rd.It is 10min drive from Twn River at Medovale & Sheppard.Does any1 know what he is talking about &where it is.Please pm me.Thank you

There is an access point to the Rouge River near Altona Rd and Kingston Rd, Glen Rouge Campground under the highway bridges. This could be the area you're talking about  but I'm not aware of any dam and I've never seen hundreds of people there, maybe a dozen. I'm not sure what you mean by Rouge River end, it doesn't "end" anywhere near here. You can also access the Rouge at the end of Island Rd.
I did some research and found "Milne Dam in Markham".Is this the 1.Are trouts here.Has any1 here fished here.let me know.thx
There is a fish ladder at Milne park. There may, or may not be, fish at said fish ladder. This is the dam you seek.
Rainbow do make it up to and past the Milne Dam.  That is why they put the fish ladder there.
i dont think you can fish right by the dam anyways.... make sure you read and follow the rules..
